entity.name: mp_term_infos
entity.query: select term_id, name, definition from mp_term_infos where term_id != 'MP:0000001'

entity.name: mp_term_subsets
entity.query: select subset from mp_term_subsets where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_synonyms
entity.query: select syn_name from mp_synonyms where term_id = '${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_dbxrefs
entity.query: select xref_id from mp_dbxrefs where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}' and xref_id like 'GO:%'

entity.name: mp_mappings
entity.query: select mapped_term_id from mp_mappings where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}' and ontology='MA'

entity.name: ma_term_infos
entity.query: select name from ma_term_infos where term_id='${mp_mappings.mapped_term_id}'

entity.name: mp_node2term
entity.query: select node_id from mp_node2term where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_node_top_level
entity.query: select top_level_node_id from mp_node_top_level where node_id=${mp_node2term.node_id}

entity.name: mp_node2term
entity.query: select term_id from mp_node2term where node_id=${mp_node_top_level.top_level_node_id}

entity.name: mp_term_infos2
entity.query: select term_id, name, definition from mp_term_infos where term_id='${mp_node2term.term_id}' and term_id != 'MP:0000001'

entity.name: mp_node2term
entity.query: select node_id from mp_node2term where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_parent_children
entity.query: select parent_node_id, child_node_id from mp_parent_children where child_node_id=${mp_node2term.node_id}

entity.name: mp_parent_children
entity.query: select child_node_id from mp_parent_children where parent_node_id=${mp_parent_children.parent_node_id}

entity.name: mp_node2term
entity.query: select term_id from mp_node2term where node_id=${mp_parent_children.child_node_id}

entity.name: phenotype_call_summary
entity.query: select count(*) from phenotype_call_summary where mp_acc='${mp_node2term.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_term_infos3
entity.query: select term_id, name, definition from mp_term_infos where term_id='${mp_node2term.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_with_pheno_image
entity.query: select term_id from mp_with_pheno_image where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: phenotype_call_summary
entity.query: select external_id, gf_acc, procedure_id, parameter_id, pipeline_id, allele_acc, strain_acc, sex, zygosity from phenotype_call_summary where mp_acc='${mp_term_infos.term_id}' and gf_db_id=3 and gf_acc like 'MGI:%' and allele_acc is not null and strain_acc is not null

entity.name: genomic_feature
entity.query: select acc, symbol from genomic_feature where acc='${phenotype_call_summary.gf_acc}'

entity.name: allele
entity.query: select symbol, acc from allele where acc='${phenotype_call_summary.allele_acc}' and gf_acc='${phenotype_call_summary.gf_acc}'

entity.name: strain
entity.query: select name, acc from strain where acc='${phenotype_call_summary.strain_acc}' and db_id=3

entity.name: phenotype_pipeline
entity.query: select stable_id, name, stable_key from phenotype_pipeline where id=${phenotype_call_summary.pipeline_id}

entity.name: phenotype_procedure
entity.query: select distinct name, stable_id, stable_key from phenotype_procedure where id = ${phenotype_call_summary.procedure_id}

entity.name: phenotype_parameter
entity.query: select name, stable_id, stable_key from phenotype_parameter where id=${phenotype_call_summary.parameter_id}
